textAfterTable: Cappex Scholarships Cappex.com is giving away thousands in scholarships for college. Some of our most popular scholarships include "$1,000 Cappex Easy College Money Scholarship," "I Don't Want to Pay for College" and "Cutting Edge Careers." To apply, simply fill out a free profile, visit the Scholarships tab and click Apply. Scholarships will be given to students with well-rounded profiles, so don't hold back on the details. "Just Because We Love You" Scholarships #1 Cappex Fan Scholarship Deadline: Dec 31, 2015 Amount: $1,000 "My College Review" Scholarship Deadline: Dec 31, 2015 Amount: $1,000 Apply Now Scholarship Winners Gallery See all scholarship winners For more information, read the general terms and conditions. Scholarship winners will be notified by mail within one month of the scholarship application deadlines.
